@dev Emitted when the author creates the campaign.

@dev Emitted when a new person contributes with the campaign.

@dev Emitted when the status of the campaign change.

campaignCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates the campaign.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the campaign data stored in IPFS.

changeStatusCampaign().details: Emitted when the status of the campaign change.

destructProposalCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when a member creates a proposal to destruct the campaign and get the founds back.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the destruct proposal data stored in IPFS.

newContribution().details: Emitted when a new person contributes with the campaign.

progressUpdate(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates a progress update to show how the proyect is going.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the progress update data stored in IPFS.

proposalCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates a proposal to free founds.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the proposal data stored in IPFS.

aproveDestructProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to approve an active destrcut proposal that they haven't approved before.

params._index: index of the destrcut proposal the member wants to approve.

aproveProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to approve an active proposal that they haven't approved before.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

params._goal: goal in wei that the proyect has to reach to be succesfull.
params._ipfshash: The url hash of the campaign data previusly stored in IPFS.*
params._minimunContribution: minimum contribution in wei that a person has to make to become a member.

contribute().details: Allow not members to contribute with the campaign and be a member of it.

createDestructProposal(bytes32).details: Allow only members to create a new proposal to finish de proyect and get the founds back.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the destruct proposal data (description) previusly stored in IPFS.

createProposal(uint256,address,bytes32).details: Allow only owner to create a new proposal to get more founds.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the proposal data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.
params._recipient: address where the founds are going to be after withdraw them.
params._value: founds in wei that the owner want to withdraw.

getCampaignInfo().details: Function to get the data of the campaign

getDestructProposalsCount().details: Function to get the total number of destruct proposals.

getDestuctProposal(uint256).details: Function to get the data of destruct proposal.

params._index: index of the destruct proposal to return

params._index: index of the proposal to return

getProposalsCount().details: Function to get the total number of proposals.

getStatus().details: Function to get the actual status of the campaign.

isMember(address).details: Function to return if someone is member.

saveProgressUpdate(bytes32).details: Allow only owner to save a new progress Update data ipfs hash.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the progress update data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.

setActive().details: Allow only owner to change the status of the cCampaign from CREATED to ACTIVE.
